title: Did media news wrongly mention that border agents separated a girl from her mother?
subtitle: The main news institutions have been criticized for explaining articles on the separation of the family at the border with a picture of a girl who was in fact never separated from her mother.
author: David Emery
vclaim: The media distorted the image of a two-year-old immigrant girl whose mother had been arrested at the United States-Mexico border as depicting a family separation.
